import React, { useState } from 'react' import { plots } from './Totaldata'; const Plots = () => { const [filter, setFilter] = useState('All'); const filteredData = plots.filter(item => { if (filter === 'All') return true; if (filter === '1200Sqft' && item.title.includes('1200Sqft')) return true; if (filter === '2400Sqft' && item.title.includes('2400Sqft')) return true; return false; }); return (

Plots in Prime Location

{/*

s

*/}
{filteredData.map((item, index) => (

{item.price}

{item.title}

{item.location}

{item.sqft}

{item.wash}

{item.furnished}

Listed On

{item.listed}

))}
) } export default Plots
